column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I was excited because I was finally going to visit my friends in Long Island .
#text=Whenever I thought about Long Island , I always thought about Great Gatsby and the wonderful homes that surrounded that area .
#text=When the day came to visit them , I boarded a subway train to Penn Station .
#text=Once I arrived at Penn Station , I looked for a machine that sold tickets .
#text=I found a machine and bought a one way train ride to Montauk .
#text=Once I bought the ticket , I looked at the schedule board on the wall to see when my train would arrive and what track number it was located on .
#text=It said that the train was arriving in 2 minutes , and the track number was 16 .
#text=I found track number 16 and waited for the train to arrive .
#text=Once it did , I simply waited for the doors to open and got on .
#text=The seats were super comfortable and I found a empty seat by the window .
#text=When the train started moving , a conductor came around collecting our tickets .
#text=Someone forgot to buy a ticket and had to pay extra money to buy one .
#text=Apparently , tickets are more expensive on the train .
#text=Once I reached my destination after 1 hour , I finally got off and went off to visit my friends .
